overview:
Sanjeev develops ventures in the financial technology space.

An experienced banker, management consultant, business head and entrepreneur, he has spent time on corporate venturing, principal investments, leading special projects relating to technology outsourcing ventures from a cost reduction and investment perspective; and advised on turnarounds and restructuring.

Early in his career he launched, managed and sold a small business.

  • Spearheaded business development, strategic alliance and marketing initiatives;
  • Member of bankâ€™s group management and ALCO;
  • Launched new products (mutual funds, private client services etc);
  • Created new ventures / start-ups / launched new operations;
  • Actively managed advisory teams - involved in all aspects of transactions from origination to closing: turnaround & rescue/workouts, private equity, M&A, capital markets (debt & equity), infrastructure projects, privatization to structured trade finance, local currency debt and structured products;
  • Raised capital from domestic & international institutions, private investors DFIs, etc;
  • Actively monitored investment (principal and institutional), research and sales teams;
  • Evaluated and monitored key principal investment positions;
  • Oversaw profit / loss, budgeting and financial management; and
  • Personally steered recruitment & training initiatives for advisory & investment staff.
